summary: A debauched nobleman offers himself to a beautiful woman, but she is repelled by his advances. He dons a mask and tries again, and this time is more successful. But the mask cannot conceal ... See full summary Â»
cast: Helena Bonham Carter|Michael Maloney|Feodor Chaliapin Jr.|Roberto Herlitzka|Alberto Cracco|Michele De Marchi|Valentina Lainati|Saskia Colombaioni|Arnaldo Colombaioni|Valerio Colombaioni|Walter Colombaioni|Maria Tedeschi|Massimo Fedele|Carlo Cataneo
title: La maschera
